ChatCommandDescription.Party: {$ChatCommand.Party} message: Send the message to your party members
ChatCommandDescription.Emote: {$ChatCommand.Emote} message: Send the message in third-person perspective
ChatCommandDescription.Playing: {$ChatCommand.Playing_0}: List the names of all players on the server
ChatCommandDescription.Help: {$ChatCommand.Help}: Lists all the commands you can use
ChatCommandDescription.RPS: {$ChatCommand.RPS}: Randomly uses a Rock, Paper, or Scissors emote
ChatCommandDescription.PVPDeath: {$ChatCommand.PVPDeath}: Shows your number of PVP deaths
ChatCommandDescription.AllPVPDeath: {$ChatCommand.AllPVPDeath}: Shows everyone's number of PVP deaths
